keys:
ARROW KEYS TO [rainbow freq=0.5 sat=1 val=20]MOVE[/rainbow]

SHIFT TO [wave amp=50 freq=2]SPRINT[/wave]

SPACE TO [wave amp=50 freq=2]JUMP[/wave]

CONTROL/Z TO [wave amp=50 freq=2]SHOOT[/wave]

B TO[wave amp=50 freq=2] FIREBALL [/wave]

(WITH POWERUP)
de:
UMSCHALT ZUM [wave amp=50 freq=2]SPRINTEN[/wave]

LEERTASTE ZUM [wave amp=50 freq=2]SPRINGEN[/wave]

2X LEERTASTE FUER [wave amp=50 freq=2]DOPPELSPRUNG[/wave]

STRG/Z ZUM [wave amp=50 freq=2]SCHIESSEN[/wave]

B FUER DEN[wave amp=50 freq=2] FEUERBALL [/wave] (MIT POWERUP)

keys: There wase definitly someone here.\nHe wanted to do something... Finish something...
de: Es war auf jeden Fall jemand hier.\nEr wollte irgendwas... Irgendetwas beenden...

keys: Can you help me get out of here?
No, I'm just a ladder. I'm no use if you want to climb out of here...
de: Nein, ich bin nur eine Leiter. Ich nütze nichts wenn du hier herausklettern willst...

de:

keys: GET ALL THE COINS IN LEVEL 0
GET ALL THE COINS IN LEVEL 1
GET ALL THE COINS IN LEVEL 2
SPACE TO [rainbow freq=0.5 sat=1 val=20]FLY UP[/rainbow]
IT'S RAINING COINS! YOU SHOT 10 TIMES!
de: ES REGNET MÜNZEN! DU HAST 10 MAL GESCHOSSEN!

keys: HEY PILOT. IT'S ME, LIQUID RANDALL.
IT LOOKS LIKE SOME NASTY MERGE CONFLICTS ARE BOMBARDING THE REPO PLANET.
BUT DON'T SWEAT IT- THE NEW AND IMPROVED MARWING CAN TAKE CARE OF IT.
JUST... FLY AROUND A BIT AND SHOOT THINGS.
OH! THEY'RE UNMANNED DRONES. IT'S FINE
de: YOU DON'T HAVE TO FEEL BAD.

keys: I BELIEVE IN YOU. YOU CAN DO IT.
